data.title: Chauncey Billups Player Profile, Detroit Pistons
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Chauncey Billups on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 25, 1997 - The Boston Celtics selected Chauncey Billups in Round 1 with Pick 3 in the 1997 NBA Draft. Sep 2, 1997 - Chauncey Billups signed a multi-year contract with the Boston Celtics. Feb 18, 1998 - Chauncey Billups was acquired by the Toronto Raptors from the Boston Celtics in a trade. Jan 21, 1999 - Chauncey Billups was acquired by the Denver Nuggets, along with the draft rights to Tyson Wheeler, from the Toronto Raptors in exchange for Dean Garrett, Bobby Jackson and a 1999 1st round pick (DEN own). Feb 1, 2000 - Chauncey Billups was acquired by the Orlando Magic, along with Ron Mercer, Johnny Taylor and a TPE, from the Denver Nuggets in exchange for Tariq Abdul-Wahad, Chris Gatling, a 2001 1st round pick (ORL own) and cash. Jul 1, 2000 - Chauncey Billups, previously with the Orlando Magic, became a free agent. Aug 3, 2000 - The Orlando Magic renounced their free-agent exception rights to Chauncey Billups. Aug 3, 2000 - Chauncey Billups signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves. Jul 1, 2002 - Chauncey Billups, previously with the Minnesota Timberwolves, became a free agent. Jul 17, 2002 - Chauncey Billups signed a multi-year contract with the Detroit Pistons. Jun 30, 2007 - Chauncey Billups exercised an Early Termination Option to void the remaining seasons on his contract. Jul 1, 2007 - Chauncey Billups, previously with the Detroit Pistons, became a free agent. Jul 11, 2007 - Chauncey Billups signed a multi-year contract with the Detroit Pistons. Nov 3, 2008 - Chauncey Billups was acquired by the Denver Nuggets, along with Antonio McDyess, Cheickh Samb and a TPE, from the Detroit Pistons in exchange for Allen Iverson and a TPE. Feb 22, 2011 - Chauncey Billups was acquired by the New York Knicks, along with Carmelo Anthony, Renaldo Balkman, Corey Brewer, Anthony Carter and Shelden Williams, from the Denver Nuggets in exchange for Wilson Chandler, Eddy Curry, Raymond Felton, Danilo Gallinari, Timofey Mozgov, Anthony Randolph, a 2012 2nd round pick (GOS own), a 2013 2nd round pick (GOS own), a 2014 1st round pick (NYK own), a Swap 2016 1st round picks and cash. Dec 10, 2011 - The New York Knicks utilized the amnesty provision on the contract of Chauncey Billups. Dec 12, 2011 - Chauncey Billups, previously with the New York Knicks, became a free agent. Dec 12, 2011 - The Los Angeles Clippers made a successful amnesty waiver claim for the contract of Chauncey Billups. Jul 1, 2012 - Chauncey Billups, previously with the Los Angeles Clippers, became a free agent. Jul 12, 2012 - Chauncey Billups signed a contract with the Los Angeles Clippers. Jul 1, 2013 - Chauncey Billups, previously with the Los Angeles Clippers, became a free agent. Jul 10, 2013 - The Los Angeles Clippers renounced their free-agent exception rights to Chauncey Billups. Jul 16, 2013 - Chauncey Billups signed a multi-year contract with the Detroit Pistons. Jul 1, 2014 - Chauncey Billups, previously with the Detroit Pistons, became a free agent. Jul 14, 2014 - The Detroit Pistons renounced their free-agent exception rights to Chauncey Billups.
